description.value: An @Compendium[pf1.classes.JcaqlAawhf14q1lq]{Alchemist} with an alchemy crafting kit is assumed to have all the material components needed for his extracts, mutagens, and bombs, except for those components that have a specific cost. An alchemy crafting kit provides no bonuses on @UUID[Compendium.pf1.pf1e-rules.x175kVqUfLGPt8tC.JournalEntryPage.3E8pxbjI8MD3JbfQ]{Craft (alchemy)} checks. (This item was previously called an "alchemist's kit", and was renamed to avoid confusion with the set of adventuring gear called an "alchemist's kit.")
